import { useState } from 'react' import {SimpleraMesage} from "../custom/simplera/js/simpleraJs" import { Loading } from './loading' const simpleraMessageContent = { name: '', email: '', message: '', } export const Footer = (props) => { const [{ name, email, message }, setState] = useState(simpleraMessageContent); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } //const clearState = () => setState({ ...simpleraMessageContent }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); SimpleraMesage.send( props.data.orgId, email, name, message ).then( (result) => { alert(props.data.data.sendOkMessage); setIsLoading(false); //clearState() }, (error) => { alert(`Error al enviar el mensaje: ${error}`); setIsLoading(false); console.log(error) } ) } if (props.data === undefined) { return (
) } return (
{ isLoading && }

{props.data ? props.data.data.titleContact : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.address : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.phone : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.email : ''}

{props.data.data.linkedin === "" ? "" : } {props.data.data.github === "" ? "" : } {props.data.data.instagram === "" ? "" : } {props.data.data.whatsapp === "" ? "" : } {props.data.data.twitter === "" ? "" : } {props.data.data.facebook === "" ? "" : }

{props.data ? props.data.data.title : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.paragraph : ''}

© {props.data ? props.data.data.textDesignBy : ''}{' '} {props.data.data.designByName}
) }
